title: Sagaria
description: Set in the mysterious world of Sagaria, this enchanting tale of adventure and friendship will charm teens and adults alike, and is the latest novel in the Sagaria series. Young Sagandran Sacks enters Sagaria in search of his missing grandfather, and soon finds himself on a quest to save not just Sagaria but two other worlds--the Shadow World and Earthworld--from the evil Shadow Master.
author: John Dahlgren
